paribhogika bhanda alewi kirimedi paribhogikayata asadharanayak wana paridi badu alewi kala welendun panas dahasak pasugiya masa paha thula paribhogika adhikariya mangin athadanguwata gena thibe.dina ikuth wu aahara wikinima , apirisudu aahara warga, wadimilata badu alewi kirima, niyamitha bara nothibima, bhanda mila pradarshanaya nokirima athulu waradi gananawak sambandhayen ema pirisa athadanguwata gena thibuni.paribhogika adhikari panathe 26 wani waganthiya ullanghanaya karamin mowun sidu kara athi waradi sambandhayen adhikaranaya idiriye nadu pawara atha.janawari sita me dakwa athadanguwata pathwu welendunta adhikaranaya mangin niyama kala dada mudala miliyana hatha ikmawa thibe.pasugiya kalaya thula welendun atharin siyayata asuwak pamana paribhogikayata asadharana wana paridi bhanda alewikara thibe.

mage hitha diwwe sachin dipu samaru kalape monawa liyala adda kiyala balanna.mechchara kalekata katawathma karanna bari una hapan kamak meya karanne hadanne kohomada kiyala mata hitha gannawath bari una.kala ulele awasan bhagaye thibune aaradhitha pasal wala idiripath kirim.eka eka pasal walin wiwidha anga idiripath kara kara yaddi mage hitha enna enna wegen gahuna.wedikawa ayine thirekata muwa wela mama hitiye nosansun hadawathin.tharuge handin sachinge namayi pasalayi kiyaddi stej eke eha paththe hitapu sanju me paththata duwagena aawa.aa...w....aa...w balamu kumarayage wada.sachin wedikawata ennath kalinma sanju kiyawanna patan gaththa.ape kattiya seramala ehe mehe ahumulu wala idagena mata hina una.eya gitar ekakuth athin aran duwagena duwagena awith stej ekata nagala issellama baluwe man diha.purudu widiyata mama bima bala gaththa.
